transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: Uh, kahan se baat kar rahe hain sir aap?
Executive: Shri Krishna and company one.
Customer: Okay, main Vishal baat kar raha hun IndiaMART third office se, kaise hain aap?
Executive: Haan ji, bahut badhiya ji. Uh, aapki baat hui hogi sir, Himanshu Bhike ji se.
Executive: Unhi ke regarding maine aapko call kiya tha. Uh, sir main puch sakta hun concern kya hai sir? Aapka yahan par ek concern open ho rakha hai.
Executive: Is kuch lead ke liye aapki baat chal rahi hai sir.
Customer: Haan ji. Sir ji maine service li hai ji, mere ko leads aayengi, mera business mera badhega.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Business badhane ke liye aapki short hai na?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: To humare jo leads bhi nahi aa rahi, frauding aa rahi. Aa rahi hai to sold out hai.
Customer: To hume show hi nahi hote the, uh, ye show hi nahi ho rahi hume, system pe aaye to bhi wo paas chale jaati hai.
Executive: Main bata deta hun sir. Aap deal kar rahe hain in product line mein sir. Main naam aapko clear kar deta hun. Ye stainless steel scrubber ho gaya, LED flood light ho gaya, foam scrub, uh, pad ho gaya, LED concealed light ho gaya.
Executive: Correct?
Customer: Correct.
Executive: Ye saare ke saare aapke products hai na sir?
Customer: Yes, yes.
Executive: Agar aap ek bari bylead open kariye. Usme recent mein check kariye, wahan par aapke paas ek lead post hui rakhi hogi sir.
Customer: Haan ji boliye ji, open ho gaya ji.
Executive: Bylead pe click kiya aapne?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Bylead, bylead wale section pe click kariyega. Haan, kar diya.
Executive: Aapke paas lead dikh rahi hogi sir, ek LED, uh, ye ceiling light ki sir.
Customer: Kahan ki? Mohali se.
Customer: Kahan ki hai? Mohali ki, Mohali ki hai. Ji sir. Sir ye deal hi nahi karte na hum.
Executive: Main samjha nahi.
Customer: Sir humari product mein deal karte hain par hum 12-12 piece ke liye nahi deal nahi kar rahe, 12-12 piece thodi bechhenge hum.
Executive: Uh, sir actual mein na online promotion hai. Isme har type ka customer aapko mil sakta hai sir. Aapke liye bhi mil sakte hain.
Customer: Nahi nahi tha ki humari, humari jo promise hai na wo 50,000 se balk mein 2.5 lakh ke upar aur 500 piece se kam quantity ka order nahi hai sir.
Executive: 500 piece se kam quantity ka order na ho. Order value kitna banega approx iska?
Customer: Yahi to 2-2.5 lakh.
Executive: 2 se 2.5 lakh. Haan, agar main 2 lakh customer ki requirement ko yahan par dekhta hun. To sir uske liye kaun kaun si location mein aap deal kar sakte hain?
Customer: Punjab mein.
Executive: Khali Punjab mein?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Uh, sir main ye kehna chahunga agar to lead humare paas available hoegi to wo hum aapke sath timely share bhi karte hain sir. Baki IndiaMART ko.
Customer: Sir aati hai wo aati hai na sir, aati hai but sold out hai.
Customer: System pe show nahi mere, mere system pe nahi aati.
Executive: Sir main aapko ek cheez batata hun. Jo is type ki lead hoti hai na, aap jaise khud bhi is lead ke liye jyada focus rehte hain to dusre jo clients hote hain na, wo bhi is lead ke liye sir dekhte rehte hain sir. To wo lead.
Customer: Sir wo bhai sahab ne ye bol raha hai, bhai sahab ne unhone promise kiya tha ki ye leads hai na jo wo paanch logo ko aati hai. Hum paanch logo mein nahi hai to humari service band kar do, humara refund kar do, bas that's all. To sir uske liye aapko active rehna padta hai sir. Dekho ab mujhe thodi na pata hai.
Customer: Kya baat kar rahe ho yaar, kya baat kar rahe ho active ki? Meri aankhen thodi na gad dunga isme system pe. Ek minute baat mein dekhta hun. Ek minute baat mein, ek minute mere open hai sir mobile mein, hath mein mobile hai. Mera account yahi hai.
Executive: Haan, to main wohi cheez aapse keh raha hun sir, aapko inform kiya gaya hai ki paanch supplier ko hum provide karte hain, wohi hum karte hain sir. Ye sir abhi bol rahe hain service, sir service ke regarding nahi bolna jab service mein bechi aapne us time nahi bola. Ye abhi bol rahe ho aap.
Executive: To us time pe kya aapko ye information nahi di gayi thi? Unhone bola ji leads aayengi ji, balk mein aayengi, aapke paas aayengi.
Executive: Haan, to balk ki lead humne jaise provide kari sir. Provide kahan ho rahi hai mere paas?
Executive: Uh, ye scrub pad mein deal karte ho sir, but wo location hai jaati hai sir. Main to, main to apni location ki baat kar raha hun na. Mujhe kya usse lena dena? Punjab ki main kaun hai mere ko, main to Punjab ki baat kar raha hun.
Executive: Main to Punjab ke liye agar bolunga at present usme bhi. Bhai sahab jisne business service bechi hai usko ko nahi pata ki Punjab mein kaam karna hai Punjab ki lead deni hai.
Executive: To aapne details unse discuss to kara hoga sir ye sari cheeze ki mujhe Punjab ki. Clear kiya hua hai sir, please clear karke hi ye maine service paise diye hain aapko. Clear karke hi diye the na? To us time pe unhone aapko ye bhi bola hoga ki jo lead hoegi sir jis time se aayegi. Dekho hum commitment is cheez ki nahi kar sakte ki main Punjab ki sari ki sari 2 lakh ki requirement hi aapko provide kar paunga sir. Aayegi to system mein hum load karenge aur usko consume kar payenge to usko aap usse buyer se bhi baat kar. Jo aa rahi hai, jo jo aa rahi hai sir wo mere paas main to usko le hi nahi pa raha hun. Jo aa rahi hai. Main to usse pehle koi aur dusra consume kar raha hoga.
Customer: That was wohi to keh rahe hain na bhai sahab. Ek ki hogi, do ki hogi ye to aa hi nahi hai na, continue aa rahi hai.
Executive: Sir dekho isme to main bas aapko yahi cheez keh sakta hun kyunki requirement hum aapko provide kar rahe hain sir.
Customer: Nahi sir mere ko nahi aa rahi, main to fir consumer court mein ja raha hun. Maine unko bol diya. Kyunki by act company act ke law ke according aap teen mahine mein paisa refund kar sakte ho. Abhi mere ko teen mahine hue hain.
Executive: Koi issue nahi hai sir, agar aisi baat hai na main ek bari discuss kar leta hun internally main aapko batata hun sir.
Customer: Haan ji. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer not receiving expected buyleads.

- Leads received are often already sold out.

- Wants leads specifically from Punjab.

- Wants a refund if service is not improved.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified the product lines.

- Executive checked for recent leads in the system.

- Executive will discuss the issue internally.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will discuss internally and revert.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, location, subscription, commitment
